data.prayer: Father, we ask for 113 new simple churches in the state of Ninh Thuận, Vietnam. Place a simple church in every community of the 565,700 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ninh Thuận, Vietnam

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 508,088 lost people in  Ninh Thuận, Vietnam have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 12,236 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 12,236 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Jesus, I pray that all the Cham, Eastern people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Cham, Eastern people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Cham, Eastern people is yours.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Ninh Thuận. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Ninh Thuận, Vietnam a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 12,236 believers in Ninh Thuận to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

location.name: Ninh Thuận
location.cities_list: Phan Rang-Tháp Chàm, Bác Ái, Tân Sơn, Phước Dân, Khánh Hải
location.cities_list_w_pop: Phan Rang-Tháp Chàm (91,520), Bác Ái, Tân Sơn, Phước Dân, Khánh Hải
